aka: I Didn’t Make it to Love Her
awards:
第75届戛纳电影节(2022)
　　影评人周单元  短片发现奖(提名) 安娜·费尔南德斯·德帕科

　　第4届海南岛国际电影节(2022)
　　金椰奖 最佳短片奖(提名)

writer.name: 安娜·费尔南德斯·德帕科 Anna Fernandez de Paco

director.name: 安娜·费尔南德斯·德帕科 Anna Fernandez de Paco

trans_title: I Didn’t Make it to Love Her
introduction: Through a photographic narrative, this film presents texts of Bosnian poet Marko Tomaš. Marko and Maja are moving flats in Sarajevo. Maja's depression turns Marko's struggle into poetry, and played on the radio, Marko’s poems become the last bridge of communication between them
